name: Golden Gun (AlanKilby, En_Dy)
description:
Your Golden Gun can one shot any enemy you come across but it only has one bullet. If you manage to get a kill you'll get your bullet back into the Golden Gun so don't miss ! 

Fight your way through scorpions, vultures and gunner skeletons and get to the final boss in this short action game made for the GBJAM9.

CONTROLS:

D-pad : Moving left and right

A: Jump

B: Shoot
